data.name: ChartDataCaption
desc: These values specify how the captions of data points are displayed.

items.name: VALUE
lines: The caption contains the value of the data point in the number format of the axis that is attached to the respective data series.

items.name: PERCENT
lines: The caption contains the value of the data point in percent of all data points of one category.
That means, if a data point is the first one of a series, the percentage is calculated by using the first data points of all available series.

items.name: TEXT
lines: The caption contains the category name of the category to which a data point belongs.

items.name: FORMAT
lines: The number formatter is always used for displaying the value as value.

items.name: SYMBOL
lines: The symbol of data column/row is additionally displayed in the caption.

items.name: CUSTOM
lines: The caption contains a custom text, which belongs to a data point label.

items.name: DATA_SERIES
lines: The name of the data series is additionally displayed in the caption.
